sentences.en: Another limitation is the lack of availability of accurate equilibrium constants.
sentences.cn: 平衡计算的另一局限性是缺乏准确的可利用的平衡常数.

sentences.en: Before travelling we must ensure the availability of petrol and oil.
sentences.cn: 旅行前,我们必须确保能够买到汽油和机油.

sentences.en: Carburetors also spread out the mixture availability.
sentences.cn: 多个化油器还可以扩大混合气的效力.

sentences.en: For terrestrial communities the principal variables are availability and temperature.
sentences.cn: 对于陆地群落,最主要是可用性和温度.

sentences.en: For these reasons, the ready availability of an extracorporeal system is helpful.
sentences.cn: 为此, 配备随时可用的体外循环装置会有帮助.

sentences.en: I'll check our room availability for the next days.
sentences.cn: 我查一下近几天是否有房。

sentences.en: In an on demand shop, business users do not want to encounter lack of availability or failure in their applications' accessing this data.
sentences.cn: 在随需应变的企业，业务用户不希望在其应用程序访问此数据时遇到缺乏可用性或发生故障的情况。

sentences.en: Its one advantage is the ready availability of data.
sentences.cn: 这个方法也有好处,就是数字现成,随时可用.

sentences.en: The availability of cheap long - term credit would help small business.
sentences.cn: 低利息的 长期 贷款对小型企业会有帮助.

sentences.en: The availability of good medical care tends to vary inversely with the need for it.
sentences.cn: 优质医疗服务的提供往往与需要成反比.

sentences.en: The availability of nursery school places varies widely across London.
sentences.cn: 伦敦幼儿园的分布非常不均衡。

sentences.en: The availability of public transport is also part of the equation.
sentences.cn: 公共交通的便利也是考虑因素之一.

sentences.en: The availability of similarity solutions to subsurface hydrologic problems is limited.
sentences.cn: 地下水文学问题相似求解的有效性是受到限制的.

sentences.en: The machine is quicker than the hand tools and even more availability.
sentences.cn: 机器比手工工具更快、更有效率.

sentences.en: The nature and availability of material evidence was not to be discussed.
sentences.cn: 实质性证据的性质和可用性毋庸讨论。

sentences.en: There are three major advantagesof the design, viz / namely cheapness, simplicity and availability.
sentences.cn: 这种设计有叁大优点, 即价廉 、 简便、实用.

sentences.en: They should not be set at or above the availability standards.
sentences.cn: 它们不应该设置为等于或高于这些可用性标准。

sentences.en: You will then be ready to calculate its overall availability, as above.
sentences.cn: 然后您将准备计算它的整体可用性，如上所述。

words.tran_cn: 有效的，可得的；可利用的；空闲的

phrases.tran_cn: 水有效性；水资源可利用量

trans.tran_cn: 可用性，有效性，可得到的东西
trans.tran_en: the quality of being at hand when needed
